TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to add new hotspot type.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the add hotspot API /api/blackspottypes. Verify that new hotspot type can be added.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to add new hotspot type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to add new hotspot type.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to add new hotspot type.
